text:
Hi everyone. I just realized that the search results in the search-results.html page template is fully rendered using JS.
Iâ€™m not SEO expert, but I think this is bad.

Is could not find anything in the documentation on how to render the results on the server side, and I am curious to know if someone has already found a solution for this.
On a second thought, maybe the search results page does not make sense to be SEO friendly, but maybe it does. Any insights would be appreciated :bow:
